note.p: American. Daughter of Abraham Marcy of Burlington, Otsego, New York. Married William M. Johnson after 1860; widowed by 1865.
D. Hamilton Hurd, History of Otsego County, New York, 1740–1878 (theusgenweb.org/ny/otsego/bios/miniburlington.htm, accessed 29 October 2020)
New York, Death index, 1852–1956 (Ancestry.com, accessed 28 October 2020)
New York, State Census, 1865 (Ancestry.com, accessed 28 October 2020)
United States Federal Census 1860 (Burlington, Otsego, New York [1]/380) (Ancestry.com, accessed 29 October 2020)
